title: Brand new ViewSonic gaming products released in Sri Lanka
body_lines: ViewSonic, a world-renowned brand with a stellar reputation in the consumer, business and professional monitor markets has introduced its gaming product line; ViewSonic Gaming to Sri Lanka catering to both casual gamers and hardcore Esports athletes alike.

ViewSonic Gaming was introduced recently around the globe with the aim of delivering quality gaming display solutions for all gamers and it has quickly emerged as the leading gaming focused monitor brand internationally. ViewSonic Gaming provides gaming monitors designed to match the gamer’s lifestyle with tasteful, modern designs and high specs at competitive prices.

The new lineup of ViewSonic Gaming products launching in Sri Lanka includes the OMNI series of IPS & curved gaming monitors. The OMNI series features premium graphics, smooth gameplay and ergonomic features allowing gamers to play for longer with less strain. The models VX3218-PC-MHD (32 inch) & VX2718-PC-MHD (27 inch) are available in Sri Lanka.
